name: GNU Data Language for Win32 (Unofficial)
short_description:
Unofficial GDL Binary distribution is here!

Build 150406: Lots of bugs are fixed. Now TV and CURSOR work quite well (but not perfect). Still widget functionality is not fully implemented yet, this version implements a fake XDISPLAYFILE and WIDGET_CONTROL, which is simply a proxy of PRINT. From this version, setup automatically associates '*.pro' files to GDL. Newly available procedures/functions - FILE_SEARCH (needs test), FILE_EXPAND_PATH(needs test), FILE_READLINK(needs test), WRITE_TIFF, POLYWARP, DIALOG_MESSAGE, and DIALOG_PICKFILE.

Build 141116: Added several missing DLLs.

Build 141105: Built based on GDL official GDL 0.9.5 release. It contains all required/optional libraries (except native NetCDF, however it would be supported by HDF5).

For older versions (before 140606), the Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013 needs to be installed.

http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=40784
summary: Unofficial Win32 binary distrubution for GNU Data Language
